title: Name?
body:
Hey guys, 

I haven't played this game since high school where this Filipino showed me the beauty of the game. (Probably 5-7 years ago)
Got tired of star craft 2, and over watch and wanted to play LOL again, whats up with my name?
\

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, when you go *inactive* in League for quite a while, your summoner name goes up for grabs as part of our [Summoner Name Cleanup initiative](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-).

If you log into the client, you should have a chance to pick a new summoner name. Let me know if you encounter issues with this.
It seems like you name was likely taken due to inactivity and you should be able to change it for free when you log in.
Just to say I did not name myself IS15a36433ef.....
